text: Gwynfor "Gwyn" Jones (20 March 1935 â€“ 13 November 2020) was a Welsh footballer. He played in the Football League for Wolverhampton Wanderers and Bristol Rovers. Jones began his playing career at Caernarfon Town, before joining English First Division high-flyers Wolverhampton Wanderers in 1955. Jones died on 13 November 2020 at a nursing home in Caernarfon, Wales at the age of 85.Gwyn Jones|1935-2020 ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Bristol Rovers F.C. players Category:Welsh footballers Category:Wolverhampton Wanderers F.C. players
title: Gwyn Jones (footballer, born 1935)
